name: Mars Invaders (Olsyx)
description:
What is it about?

Mars Invaders is a copy of Atari's classic Space Invaders. It has three thrilling levels of increasing difficulty, three variants of mars people each with a different bullet type, and even an ovni ship! The player only has one type of bullet and, in one instance, defenses.

Controls

Left Arrow / a: Move player to the left
Right Arrow / d: Move it to the right
Return / z: Shoot

Tools:  Lua and LÖVE2D for development, Photoshop for the graphics.

Note: Darkatom was my old username :)

You can check the code for this game at my Github repository!
